entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 10:12 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
